name: Tempest 2000
overview: Turn out the lights, turn up the volume and prepare for a mind-blowing assault on the senses. Once your neurotransmitters get a taste of the hypnotic rhythms of 100% pure techno-rave, you'll be hooked...Unable to escape the rush of blasting Flippers and Demon Heads as enhanced 3D polygons, screaming particle displays and hyperdelic Melt-O-Visionâ„¢ graphics warp you into the ultraviolent 64th Dimension... Developed by legendary game developer Jeff Minter (Llamasoft)
